iti108:4.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, bhikkhū kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī unnaḷā asamāhitā, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā.
iti108:4.2: Apagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā;
iti108:4.3: na ca te imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
iti108:4.4: Ye ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhū nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā atthaddhā susamāhitā, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā.
iti108:4.5: Anapagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā;
iti108:4.6: te ca imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantī”ti.
iti108:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
